sub_title: Digital Marketing at Booking.com | Product Manager | Certified Scrum Product Owner (PSPO I)
summary:
15+ years of experience in Digital Marketing, Product Management, Growth and Go-To-Market Strategy. Specialities: 
✪ Go-To-Market strategy (from MVP to product/ market fit).
✪ Product management and product marketing.
✪ Performance marketing, multi-media marketing projects and cross-channel campaigns (SEO, SEM/ PPC, Display, Social Media, Native, TVC, OOH, etc.).
✪ Partner marketing and program management.
✪ Entrepreneurial mindset (startup founder 2005-2009).
✪ Agile, Scrum.
✪ Team lead (up to 6 fte).

INDUSTRIES:
Marketing & Communications (agencies), Travel, Consumer Electronics/ Hardware, Telecommunications and E-commerce/ Marketplace. 

MARKETING TECHNOLOGY:
Marketo, Salesforce, HubSpot, Zendesk, Drupal, WordPress, Episerver, Contentful, MailChimp, AdStage, Supermetrics, Hotjar, Google Analytics, Data Studio, GTM, etc.

FULLSTACK WEB DEVELOPMENT:
JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Git, GitHub, Axios, Bootstrap, API, JIRA, Gatsbyjs, etc.

PRODUCT MANAGEMENT SKILLS:
Agile, Scrum, UX/ UI, A/B testing, Go-To-Market, Stakeholder Management, SaaS, etc.

PERFORMANCE MARKETING (hand-on experience):
Google AdWords, Google Display, SEO, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Linkedin, Native (Outbrain, Strossle), ABM (Terminus, Demandbase).

DATA ANALYTICS:
Google Analytics, Data Studio, MySQL, Hadoop/Hive, Hotjar, etc.

LANGUAGES:
English, Swedish, Dutch and Russian.

profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing
Senior Online Marketer
Global Product Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a Country Marketing Manager, I was responsible for product marketing of visitsweden.nl with a focus on digital marketing campaigns, business development, partners relations and content strategy: 
• Building and executing marketing strategy for the Nordics market.
• Growth strategy, business plan execution, cross-functional team leadership and coaching (4 fte).
• Launching multi-channel marketing campaigns (digital, social media, PR and trade marketing).
• Building relationships and forming international partnerships with existing and new clients.
• User and Market research;
• Planning and executing integrated, multi-media marketing projects and cross-channel campaigns with a focus on digital and social media.
• Media planning and media buying (direct and via media agencies).
• Supervising administrative, legal and finance operations for Dutch branch.

VisitSweden is a communications company that is responsible for marketing Sweden as a tourist destination abroad and for the Sweden brand and the image of Sweden. The company is jointly owned by the Swedish state and the Swedish tourism industry and has about 80 employees in 13 offices around the world, including the head office in Stockholm.
profile_positions.title: Country Marketing Manager (Benelux)

profile_positions.description:
As a country marketing manager and head of a representative office, I led online advertising and brand campaigns for visitsweden.ru:
• Building and executing a marketing strategy for the CIS market.
• Growth strategy and product marketing with focus on content management and digital campaigns.
• Adopted global communication strategy in order to gain valuable market share.
• 360 multi-channel marketing campaigns (TV, outdoor, print, radio, online, social media, etc.).
• Social media strategy and Influencer marketing campaigns (working with bloggers to create impactful word of mouth within our audience).
• As a project manager successfully managed multiple demanding projects: new product development, communication and trade marketing campaigns, workshops and exhibitions, PR & social media projects, consumer events etc.
• Identified and generated new business opportunities (created new communications projects funded by sponsors/ partners: IKEA FAMILY loyalty program, Volvo Cars co-branding campaign, Electrolux iPad application etc.).
• Developed and implemented a social media strategy for the Russian market.
• Formed new partnerships with airlines (SAS, Aeroflot) and ferries (Tallink Silja Line, St. Peter Line) to provide joint marketing campaigns.
• Planning and executing integrated cross-channel marketing campaigns with an emphasis on offline (TV, outdoor, radio) and digital (display, SEM, social media). 
• Media planning and media buying (direct and via media agencies).
• Launched iPad travel app for foodies in cooperation with Electrolux (over 20.000 downloads)
• Recruited professionals and build a team with a high level of trust and support to each other (4 fte).
• Managed administrative, finance and accounting operations. Coordinated the process of establishing and legal operations of the Moscow office.
profile_positions.title: Country Marketing Manager (Russia)

profile_positions.description:
In AGT Communication Group I worked as a project manager for one of the major clients The Ministry of sport, tourism and youth policy of the Russian Federation:
• Website development, launching a corporate blog, social media monitoring, etc.
• Led and supervised partner relationships including sales, consulting, analytics, project management etc.
• Managed over 50 PR campaigns for the client (including press conferences, press tours, workshops, events).
• Planned and executed advertising campaigns (TV, radio, outdoor, print and internet).
• Published a limited edition book “The 100 Greatest Russian Athletes”.

AGT Communications Group is Russia's leading public relations agency with more than 330 employees all around the Russia. AGT consists of 7 different companies with specializing in PR and corporate communications, social media, event management, analytics, corporate media etc.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Founder "hat": Business development and client relations (Microsoft, Intel, Apple, VEON, SAAB, Swedbank, ABBYY, BenQ, Kaspersky, etc.); 
• Product Owner/ Product Manager "hat": Product development of mystery shopping SaaS software.

As a Project Manager, I was responsible for business development and product implementation for such clients as SAAB, Swedbank, Microsoft, Intel, Apple, Vimpelcom, Antanta Capital, ABBYY, BenQ, Kaspersky Labs:
• Maximised profits by negotiating contracts with new and existing clients.
• Expanded company partners network in Russia, Ukraine, and Kazakhstan (over 260 cities). 
• Successfully supervised a team of teleworkers and regional suppliers which reduced costs and maximised profit for the company.
• Zipped through all business process to improve organisation business model and obtained "MSPA Europe" membership/ certificate.
• Product marketing and product development (mystery shopping SaaS software).

Qualitage was a market research startup providing mystery shopping surveys and customer experience management.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a category marketing manager, I was responsible for the high-income consumer segment:
• Designed and structured marketing strategy and long-term customer journey model for the high-income customers segment.
• Launched new products and services: price plans, promo campaigns, etc.
• New product development and product marketing (co-branding mobile phone with Samsung).
• Successfully managed all marketing activities, products and services for the segment (research, advertising, PR, internet marketing, product development, financial analysis etc.).

VimpelCom is an international communications and technology company with more than 200 million customers across Europe, Asia and Africa.
profile_positions.title: Category Marketing Manager

company.name: iRU (IT holding Merlion branch, No.30 in Forbes Russia)

profile_positions.description:
We launched iRU brand on consumer electronics market in 2002. I've started as a head of analytical department and within few month was promoted to the position of marketing director (with the team of 12 employees and several million euro marketing budget). 

Achieved results:
Developed and implemented marketing strategy for B2B and B2C channels.
Planned and executed marketing campaigns (advertising, B2B, PR etc.).
Strengthened brand identity and communication strategy by conducting and evaluating consumer surveys.
Planned and coordinated digital communication campaigns, website, telemarketing.
Leveraged partnership with key vendors (Intel, Microsoft, AMD, NVIDIA) and allowed the business to widen its target markets and distribution channels.

Main achievements: increased market share from 3,5% to 17%, increased brand awareness from 7% to 56%, obtained awards for best marketing in IT industry "THE BEST BRAND/EFFIE 2003" and for best TV commercial "Grand Prix Red Apple International Advertising  Festival 2003".

Merlion is broadline and project-based distribution holding. The largest Russian dealer in information technologies, electronics and household appliances, stationery and office furniture. Merlion is No.30 in Forbes rating "200 largest private-held companies in Russia".
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager (Consumer electronics)

profile_positions.description:
In IACG, I conducted qualitative and quantitative marketing studies, prepared analytical reports, presented findings and conclusions to the clients.

Main achievement: As a project manager conducted a marketing study "Innovation business in Russia" based on interviews with venture capitalists, scientists etc. 

IACG is a marketing research agency specialised in technology, finance and retail rectors.
profile_positions.title: Market Research Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Carried out market research in the telecommunication sector.

The Boston Consulting Group (BCG) is a worldwide management consulting firm with 85 offices in 48 countries.
profile_positions.title: Summer Internship

volunteer_experiences.description:
In AISEC, I developed relationships with partners, planned and implemented projects, supported fundraising for projects, trained and coached junior members of the association.

Main achievement: as a key fundraiser and project team member arranged SCR/ sustainability event "Discovery Wild Russia". As a project leader launched project “Education+”, the series of lectures and master classes from business professionals.

AIESEC is an international non-governmental not-for-profit organisation that provides young people with leadership development and cross-cultural global internship and volunteer exchange experiences across the globe, with a focus to empower young people so they can make a positive impact on society. The AIESEC network includes over 100,000 members in 133 countries and territories. It is the largest youth-run organisation in the world.
